title: Executive Order 6545-Change of Name of Customs Port of Nyando, New York
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 1 of the act of August 1, 1914 (ch. 223, 38 Stat. 609, 623; 19 U.S.C., sec. 2), it is hereby ordered that the name of the customs port of Nyando, New York, in customs collection district no. 7 (St. Lawrence), with headquarters at Ogdensburg, New York, be, and the same is hereby, changed to Rooseveltown, New York, effective as of this date.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6545-Change of Name of Customs Port of Nyando, New York Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362302
